scripts.build: echo 'Building package-b...' && mkdir -p dist && echo 'export const name = "package-b";' > dist/index.js
scripts.test: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); if(!pkg.name) throw new Error('name missing'); if(!pkg.version) throw new Error('version missing'); console.log('\u2713 package-b: name=' + pkg.name + ', version=' + pkg.version + ' (OK)');"
